Description: Gotham Men's Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch with Desktop Stand # GWC18802TB-ST FEATURES Classic round silver-tone 17 jewel mechanical double cover pocket watch suitable for engraving Intricately designed front and back covers that both open to expose movement Scratch resistant front and back mineral crystals Includes 14" steel curb pocket watch chain plus bonus solid brass desktop stand Arrives in beautiful presentation box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions DESCRIPTION This classic and elegant two-tone exhibition pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a precision 17 jewel mechanical movement showcased in full view when the front and back case covers are opened showing all moving parts, highly polished intricately designed two-tone case and scratch resistant mineral crystals to protect your timepiece. In addition, this watch includes a 14 inch steel curb chain that can attach to your belt loop plus a bonus solid brass desktop stand to display your timepiece when not worn. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price. Enjoy.
